title: How to Make a Brownie Cheesecake

steps.headline: Prepare two sheet cakes worth of brownies, following the manufacturers instructions.
steps.description: You'll need one for the crust, and the other to sprinkle on top of the cheesecake itself.

steps.headline: Mix together the cream cheese, whipping cream, sugar and vanilla, along with the eggs
Pour the conglomerated mixture over the sheet cake pan of brownies.
Cut up the second brownie pan into tiny crumb pieces.
Allow the brownie and cheesecake baked tray to cool.
Add a light and fluffy layer of whipped cream to the top of the cheesecake filling layer.
Sprinkle on some of the tiny brownie pieces over the cheesecake itself.
Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for a few hours.

text: Preheat your oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Prepare two sheet cakes worth of brownies, following the manufacturers instructions. You'll need one for the crust, and the other to sprinkle on top of the cheesecake itself. Mix together the cream cheese, whipping cream, sugar and vanilla, along with the eggs  Pour the conglomerated mixture over the sheet cake pan of brownies.  Bake in oven for 35 minutes.  Cut up the second brownie pan into tiny crumb pieces. Place these aside. Allow the brownie and cheesecake baked tray to cool.  Add a light and fluffy layer of whipped cream to the top of the cheesecake filling layer.  Sprinkle on some of the tiny brownie pieces over the cheesecake itself.  Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for a few hours.
